description: A shell script used to test if a specific TCP host and port are available, with options for timeout, quiet mode, strict mode, and executing commands after the check.

methods.name: echoerr
methods.description: Outputs error messages to stderr unless in quiet mode.

methods.name: wait_for
methods.description: Waits for the specified host and port to become available, with optional timeout.

methods.name: wait_for_wrapper
methods.description: Wraps wait_for with support for SIGINT and timeout handling.
